title: Virgin Galactic sets date and announces crew for first commercial SpaceShipTwo flight
summary: Virgin Galactic plans to conduct its first fully commercial flight of its SpaceShipTwo suborbital spaceplane on June 29, carrying three Italians who will conduct more than a dozen experiments.

title: What’s Happening in Space Policy June 25-July 1, 2023

title: Anduril acquires solid rocket motor manufacturer Adranos
summary: Defense contractor Anduril Industries acquired Adranos, a manufacturer of solid rocket motors, the companies announced June 25.

title: Senate Armed Services Committee advances 2024 NDAA
summary: The Senate Armed Services Committee on June 23 advanced its version of the 2024 National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) by a vote of 24-1 after closed deliberations.

title: Defense Authorization, Appropriations Bills Ready for Floor Action
summary: The House and Senate Armed Services Committees completed their work on the FY2024 National Defense Authorization Act this week, with both committees approving their bills almost unanimously. The House Appropriations […]
